resources.string: Learn about the most advanced AI models
ChatGPT is an AI chatbot developed by OpenAI, based on the GPT architecture. It\'s known for its conversational abilities and wide range of knowledge.
Google Bard is an experimental conversational AI service powered by LaMDA. It draws on information from the web to provide fresh, high-quality responses.
DeepSeek is a powerful Chinese LLM developed by DeepSeek, featuring advanced capabilities in coding, mathematics, and general knowledge. It supports long context understanding up to 128K tokens.
LLaMA (Large Language Model Meta AI) is a collection of foundational language models released by Meta, ranging from 7B to 65B parameters.
Qwen is Alibabas large language model series, including Qwen-7B and Qwen-14B. It performs well on Chinese tasks and supports long context understanding.
BanglaLLM is the first large-scale language model specifically designed for Bangla language, developed by researchers in Bangladesh.
